E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 6/2/1988
Subject: Progress of Dave Otto
Dear Sir,
Dave Otto has nothing more to prove at A Osceola Astros!
He has an ERA of 3.57 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Tuesday, 6/3/1988
Subject: Contract extension question
Dear Sir,
My contract expires after this season.
I would like to resign, so please let's talk!

Regards,
Cliff Speck
